titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1184.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Hollings. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Approved for reporting without amendment favorably.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Chiles without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 248.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 92-5. Record Vote No: 354.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1184 (airport and aviation programs).
